availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Archibald Mooney (Hopkins County and Webster County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Hopkins County and Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. Pennsylvania native. Married to Clarky Mooney. Father of Nancy Mooney, Edward Mooney, John Mooney, Archibald Mooney, Thomas Mooney, William D. Mooney, and James H. Mooney. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Webster County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 124B-125A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 602.
"Archibald Mooney (1803-1884)," Find A Grave, Memorial #42468763, accessed December 14, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/42468763.
